about_the_game:
Embark on an exciting journey and become a real fantasy hero in the "Royal Romances: Forbidden Magic" interactive story! Additional picturesque locations with multiple mysteries and hidden objects await you in each episode of the series! You will have to play as a completely different and distinctive characters, to be at the crossroads to save the magic world and make difficult decisions that affect the game's plot. Reveal some interesting secrets to learn more about romantic story series and fully immerse yourself in the world of Royal Romances!

The fantasy adventure continues with the additional content "Royal Romances: Forbidden Magic DLC" full of fabulous creatures, dark magic experiments and unexpected plot twists. Unlock new achievements after completing all quests!

✨ LEARN THE ANCIENT STORY!
Explore the story of wondrous dragons and their origin!

✨ VENTURE INTO THE FORBIDDEN FOREST!
Delve into the murkiest wilderness of the Forbidden Forest! Don’t let yourself be deceived!

✨ FIND OUT ABOUT THE FUTURE!
Unveil what the future holds for you with the mystery Prophecy Cube!

✨ EXPLORE THE EMPTY VILLAGE!
Help your woodland companion discover where an entire village has disappeared!
